jason.infra.centralised

Class RunCentralisedMAS

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
      • jason.infra.centralised.BaseCentralisedMAS
        • jason.infra.centralised.RunCentralisedMAS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RunCentralisedMASMBean, javax.management.NotificationBroadcaster, javax.management.NotificationEmitter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunJadeMAS

    public class RunCentralisedMAS
extends BaseCentralisedMAS
implements RunCentralisedMASMBean
    Runs MASProject using centralised infrastructure.
